Uses of Interface
org.ow2.bonita.facade.runtime.ActivityInstance

Packages that use ActivityInstance
org.ow2.bonita.connector.core Provides classes for creating Connectors. 
org.ow2.bonita.definition Contains interfaces to be implemented for Hooks, Mappers, Performer Assignments, Multi-instantiation.
 
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.rest.stringconverter   
org.ow2.bonita.facade.runtime It contains interfaces for recorded data for runtime informations on different types of workflow elements : process, activity, variable, connectors.
 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.runtime.impl Contains classes implementing runtime elements (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.light.impl Provides classes implementing light-weight elements (internal use only).

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade that return types with arguments of type ActivityInstance

          Returns all records of activity for the given process instance UUID.
 Set<ActivityInstance> QueryRuntimeAPI.getActivityInstances(ProcessInstanceUUID instanceUUID, String activityName)
          Returns records for all iterations and multi-instantiations that should append for the given process instance UUID and activity Id.
An empty set is returned if no instance is found.
